title: A highly stable Pr2NiO4+δ oxygen electrode in electrolyte supported protonic ceramic electrolysis cells (PCECs) for hydrogen production with high faradaic efficiency
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,861-873
DOI: 10.1039/D3YA00542A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Leon Schley, Vaibhav Vibhu, Lucy Nohl, Izaak C. Vinke, L. G. J. (Bert) de Haart, Rüdiger-A. Eichel
This study investigates the faradaic efficiency in BaCe0.7Zr0.1Y0.1Yb0.1O3−δ electrolyte supported protonic ceramic electrolysis cells (PCECs). Furthermore, excellent durability is demonstrated with a Pr2NiO4+δ oxygen electrode.
